step.cmd: Remove the screws on the stand. Screw the clump weight to the stand again as the picture shows.
Push the Yeastar device into the stand.
Fix two screws on the wall, and then you could mount the stand to the wall.

task.title: Connection of Ethernet Ports
task.shortdesc: Yeastar TA provides one 10/100M adaptive RJ45 Ethernet LAN port.

step.cmd: Connect one end of a network cable to the LAN port of the gateway.
Connect the other end to any port of companyâ€™s LAN switch/router.

task.title: Connection of FXS Ports
task.shortdesc: TA FXS gateways are available with 5 models, supporting up to 32 FXS ports.

step.cmd: Connect one end of a RJ11 phone cable to the port.
Connect the other end to your analog telephone.
